snippet: School aid is skewed to help districts of politically powerful legislators. It should be changed to spread more money to impoverished areas.
abstract: Editorial underscores need for more financing to be allocated to poorer public school districts in New York State as Gov Andrew Cuomo and state legislative leaders hammer out $142 billion budget for 2013-14 fiscal year.
lead_paragraph: School aid is skewed to help districts of politically powerful legislators. It should be changed to spread more money to impoverished areas.
